about_the_game:
Introduction to the game:
This is a classic puzzle leisure game. There are many types of second-order girls. You can also interact with your sister after you put the pieces together


Game features
1. Classic puzzles for leisure
2. 20 different exquisite quadratic girls, each picture has live 2D animation
3. 10 interactive level

content_descriptors.notes:
All characters involved in sexual content are over the age of 18.

This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Gef
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 Sound Device
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
